title: Lets get rid of Revive.
body: I think revive has no place in league and its should be replaced with a new summoner spell or just entirely removed from the game. Think about it, when was the last time you saw anyone use revive for anything but trolling? It may just be me being a typical low elo player and getting salty over the teleport revive trolls in ranked play but I genuinely think revive has seen its day.

replies.body: r.i.p phantoml0rd i cri ery tiem

Lets see here, the community is 100% against ruining out of meta strats, the outcry when they were going to remove revive was so much that it was kept in the game, Phantoml0rd who is known for his TP/Revive Karthus also had a big influence on revive not being removed.

But this little OCE poll is going to make Riot change there mind, sure, guess what i'm 100% against ruining out of meta things as well unless its broken as %%%% which revive is not its pretty garbage.

Shhh. You support Cloud 9. Your opinion is invalid here! jks. Classic banter. 
But seriously. Revive is not a waste summoner spell. Players just don't see the potential of the spell and are more favourable to the meta of Flash/Ignite/Ghost/Teleport/Exhaust combinations. 

Additionally. If your argument is solely based on the fact that you hardly see Revive. I have to argue that point on the basis that I see far more Revives than Clairvoyance.

I personally would like an "anti-exhaust". Kinda like how heal used to be the anti-ignite when it was buffed.

I don't think that is quite true. I looked at this[](http://www.probuilds.net/champions/Karthus) and didn't find a single use of revive in the past months, and even if it was an "essential" spell for him is it really necessary to have a spell for one champion in a champion pool of 100+?

yes. it's karthus. also, those people just don't know how to play karthus.

To be fair Revive can be useful on any champ who doesn't like being dead, such as hec that speed boost (if it still occurs) will give him a damage boost, then for APC who take zhonya's and GA they're not dead at all, and finally to stop an ace and on gotta go fast champs
I'm a fan of revive for late game, but that requires you to have a pretty much useless spell until late game. I don't think it should get removed though.
